topic.title: Immunization Medication Information Manufactured Material - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.22 Vaccine Administered Value Set DYNAMIC (CONF:9007)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] lotNumberText (CONF:9014)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:9008)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:9009)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:9010)
code MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:9011)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.22 Vaccine Administered Value Set DYNAMIC (CONF:9007)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] lotNumberText (CONF:9014)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:9008)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:9009)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:9010)
code MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:9011)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <material xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <code code="Value"/> <lotNumberText/> </material>
